channel.title: Comments on: Introducing Keyboard Shortcuts, our first Labs feature

item.title: By: Barry Carter
item.dc:creator: Barry Carter
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://2code.info/demo/themes/Discy/Main/2018/04/18/introducing-keyboard-shortcuts-our-first-labs-feature/#comment-74">James Wane</a>.
Ok, we’re claiming we want to highlight what’s important & finally moved the information back to the top of the question instead of burying it at the bottom. Good start.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to James Wane.

Ok, we’re claiming we want to highlight what’s important & finally moved the information back to the top of the question instead of burying it at the bottom. Good start.

item.title: By: James Wane
item.dc:creator: James Wane
item.description: I have seen Most Wanted that come in two flavors – anything Marc asks and random personal questions, applicable to no one but the OP. Most Wanted is not working.
item.content:encoded: I have seen Most Wanted that come in two flavors – anything Marc asks and random personal questions, applicable to no one but the OP. Most Wanted is not working.
